#labels GTM,Featured
= Introduction =

This service provides many benefits to importers and exporters who deal with US and China based trading.


= Details =
Some of the features of this service are:<BR>
- GTM specific analystics <BR>
- Correction to Commodity Classification<BR>
- Identification of restricted party or embargo country<BR>
- Proactive Financial Information<BR>
- L/C Management<BR>
- GTM Content Management including customer, supplier, products and sites<BR>
